page.title: 14Clubs;Netherthorpe & Area.
page.content:
{ The Friends of Netherthorpe}started about 1975 and organises things for the school. It is run by parents and teachers. All proceeds go to the school. They raise about Â£2000 per year. Their first idea was to try to keep the school as a Grammar School but it is now a Comprehensive. Any people who are connected with the school can join. As well as{Scouts and Guides}there is a{B M X Club called Staveley Sliders. There are{sports and athletics clubs. The{debating society}gives pupils at Netherthorpe a chance to give their views on certain things. In Woodthorpe there is a{keep fit club,{Church club}and a{Choral club.
By Kelvin Hazelby.
